column4: can anyone give me advice on how to backup my system to a DVD?
mondo backup or sbackup i think both do it...
google around for 'backup' 'dvd' 'linux' and/or 'ubuntu' & 'edgy' as suggested keywords
presuming you're using edgy, of course!
are you sure hdc is your dvd drive? o.0
sounds like a hard drive to me...strange
indeed it is. try the mount -a
i am tempted to do the dreaded reboot :-/
yeah...try mounting the drive manually first.
thanks anyway but this is frustrating me, i have several discs to burn.  i'm gonna just reboot... (feels like windows, ech!)
